name: Classic 2048 Merge Solitaire
description:
Mixture of famous 2048 and classic Solitaire game.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Pick cards and place on the other available cards.
- If the card matches, it will merge and become of double number.
- Merge the cards to make 2048,4096 and so on.
- There are three power cards with different powers.
- Undo-Card : It increase an undo card chance by 1.
- Wild-Card : Can be placed on any card to double the card.
- Bomb-Card : Used to remove the whole line of cards.

These are the basic rules of the game. Download and enjoy the all new version of classic 2048 and simple Solitaire game.
